contest-event.event-date: March 17, 1956 D Midlands Area (Championship Section) Midlands Area (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results.
